name: Little Timmy goes to hell
description:
Made in 10 days for Juice Jam 2 with the theme :
"Paying the price"

--------------------------------------------

Little Timmy is a really mischievous kid. 

Always up to no good.

Unfortunatly for him his bad deeds caught up with him...
A little trip to Hell should set him right... or so they thought.

 --------------------------------------------

---- Controls ---- ---- Keyboard ----

A/D to move

W/Space to jump

Arrow keys to aim and shoot

Enter to pay

P/Escape to pause

---- Gamepad / Controller (Windows Only) ----

L-Stick / D-Pad to move

LT / D-Pad to jump

R-Stick to aim

RT to shoot

A(Xbox) / X(PS) to pay

Start to pause

NB : Gamepad / Controller is only supported in the windows version 

---- Musics ----

"Doobly Doo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Cruising for Goblins" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Desert of Lost Souls" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Mega Hyper Ultrastorm" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
